p: Guvenalpet al. [ 129] isolated the sesquiterpene coumarins such as umbelliprenin ( 42) and feselol ( 43) from the chloroform extract of Heptapteracilicica fruits. The compounds showed potential inhibitory activity against AChE (IC 50 = 6 ± 0.03 μM and 1 ± 0.01 μM, respectively) and BChE (IC 50 = 10 ± 0.24μM and 1 ± 0.19 μM, respectively) and established the plant as an emerging source in AD treatment. Other studies have also been conducted in the past, supporting the anticholinesterase activity of these compounds.
